work.text: Your boss asks you to work late on Friday. Do you say yes?
A coworker takes credit for your idea. Do you confront them?
You find a major bug in production. Do you report it immediately?

food.text: Your friend orders pizza. Do you eat the last slice?
The restaurant gets your order wrong. Do you send it back?
You're full but there's food left. Do you force yourself to finish?

love.text: Your ex texts you. Do you reply?
You see your crush on a dating app. Do you swipe right?
Your friend likes someone you're interested in. Do you back off?

desi.text: Your mom asks about marriage. Do you change the topic?
Relatives compare you to others. Do you engage in the competition?
Family insists on traditional career. Do you follow your passion?

ethical_realist.title: THE ETHICAL REALIST
ethical_realist.tagline: You see the world as it is, but choose to be better

chaotic_good.title: THE CHAOTIC GOOD
chaotic_good.tagline: Rules are made to be broken, especially if it's for a good cause

orderly_skeptic.title: THE ORDERLY SKEPTIC
orderly_skeptic.tagline: You believe in systems, but question everything

pragmatic_dreamer.title: THE PRAGMATIC DREAMER
pragmatic_dreamer.tagline: You balance idealism with practical wisdom

rebel_with_cause.title: THE REBEL WITH CAUSE
rebel_with_cause.tagline: You challenge norms and embrace the unconventional

balanced_mediator.title: THE BALANCED MEDIATOR
balanced_mediator.tagline: You find harmony in opposing forces

idealistic_visionary.title: THE IDEALISTIC VISIONARY
idealistic_visionary.tagline: You see the world as it could be, not as it is

practical_realist.title: THE PRACTICAL REALIST
practical_realist.tagline: You focus on what works in the real world
